trans-unit.resname: J18·1 | Merchant Scroll | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merchant Scroll
trans-unit.target: Merchant Scroll

trans-unit.resname: J18·1 | Merchant Scroll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J18·1 | Merchant Scroll | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A rare find, suitable for the most discerning collector.
trans-unit.target: A rare find, suitable for the most discerning collector.

trans-unit.target: Vampiric Tutor

trans-unit.resname: J18·2 | Vampiric Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: J18·2 | Vampiric Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I can tell you what you wish to know. But first, there is the matter of my fee."
trans-unit.target: "I can tell you what you wish to know. But first, there is the matter of my fee."

trans-unit.resname: J18·3 | Nin, the Pain Artist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."
trans-unit.target: "Your body is a delicate instrument that tells me truths. These devices help me 'tune' that instrument."

trans-unit.resname: J18·5 | Teferi's Protection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teferi's Protection
trans-unit.target: Teferi's Protection

trans-unit.resname: J18·5 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
trans-unit.target: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

trans-unit.resname: J18·5 | Teferi's Protection | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: Exile CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: J18·5 | Teferi's Protection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Someday, when the world is safe again, my homeland will return."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: "Someday, when the world is safe again, my homeland will return."\n—Teferi

trans-unit.resname: J18·6 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord of Atlantis
trans-unit.target: Lord of Atlantis

trans-unit.resname: J18·6 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
trans-unit.target: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

trans-unit.resname: J18·6 | Lord of Atlantis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.
trans-unit.target: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

trans-unit.target: Rhystic Study

trans-unit.resname: J18·7 | Rhystic Study | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.
trans-unit.target: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you *need* to know.

trans-unit.source: Every predator is something else's prey.
